item.title: CVE-2024-6619|2024-08-13T16:41:03.858Z -- aveva -- reports%20for%20operations%202023
item.description: In Ocean Data Systems Dream Report, an incorrect permission vulnerability could allow a local unprivileged attacker to escalate their privileges and could cause a denial-of-service.
